description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a world before graphical fidelity, quick-time events or bloom filters, two oblong warriors square off in not-quite mortal combat, in a no-holds possible fight to the bitter end.
description.short: In a world before graphical fidelity, quick-time events or bloom filters, two oblong warriors square off in not-quite mortal combat, in a no-holds possible fight to the bitter end.
